title: GoT: House Of DragTrends 7/22: Steve Bannon, Josh Hawley, Olivia Wilde, GoT, LotR
itunes:title: GoT: House Of DragTrends 7/22: Steve Bannon, Josh Hawley, Olivia Wilde, GoT, LotR
description:
In this edition of GoT: House Of DragTrends, Jack, Miles, and super producer Becca discuss Steve Bannon being found guilty, Josh Hawley running for his life, the (alleged) potential Wilde/Pugh beef, and the new trailers for GoT and Lord of the Rings!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:keywords: Steve Bannon, Josh Hawley, Olivia Wilde, Florence Pugh, Game of Thrones, Lord of the Rings
